body:
I come to these just to see the putrid comment sections of people saying things like "too many NTR doujins, so bland" and then flocking to every vanilla doujin as if it was back before sliced bread was even invented and it's sliced bread, or just acting like some pure virgin who's poisoned by NTR despite them probably reading EVERY other fucked up thing and liking it, like rape or snuff.

And then you have a bunch of people wishing to ban people for making this. Sounds like you're just a hairs breathe away from being the kind of people who make death threats about fictional characters not being the way you want.

Reminds me a little of those people who made death threats to actual mangaka over shit they didn't like.

Get a life. Not that you'll actually ever get one.
lmao. An NTR comment section would never be not funny.
i hate bbm and netorare this is a double downer, and elma is from my favorite anime so fuck whoever wrote this, please burn in hell
Why doesn't the baby have an umbilical cord

NTR just gets so old so fast. Its the single most stale and overdone genre despite being a relatively "new" fad, simply because it's already exhausted all the creativity that the logical fallacies already limited.
NTR is life
BOOOOOOOOOOOO
...Almost every fuckin tank,story,doujin someone shit out to this fuckin site is fucking NTRASH.What the fuck is wrong with you people? -- MEMBER OF ANTI-NTRASH MOVEMENT --
